abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Additional
            Financing for the Emergency Social Action Project for Congo,
            Democratic Republic of is to improve access of the poor to
            social and economic services and increase the availability
            and management of development resources at the community
            level. The closing date of the project will be extended from
            March 31, 2013 until June 30, 2013. The extension is
            necessary to compensate for some of the implementation delay
            caused by a World Bank request to change disbursement
            procedures (after six months, disbursement procedures were
            reverted to the original ones). In particular, the extension
            will make it possible to finalize the implementation of 175
            sub-projects, of which 125 financed by the first additional
            financing and 50 by the second additional financing. This
            will bring the total number of sub-projects completed under
            the first additional financing to 327 and the total number
            of sub-projects financed under the second additional
            financing to 58, equivalent to a disbursement of about USD
            10 million.
